user_agent.objective: Plan a 12-day photography expedition to Iceland focusing on landscape photography, northern lights, and optimal lighting conditions.
user_agent.initial_message: I'm planning a photography expedition to Iceland! I want to capture landscapes, northern lights, and waterfalls during optimal lighting conditions. Can you help me plan this photography-focused trip?
user_agent.user_persona: Serious photography enthusiast focused on capturing perfect shots; willing to wake early and stay late for ideal lighting conditions.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially want to visit 20 photography locations, then reduce to 8-10 key spots when reminded of travel time and lighting windows.
When asked about preferred shooting times, provide impossible schedule 'sunrise at 3 PM' first; after system flags it, correct to realistic sunrise times.
Request guaranteed clear skies and northern lights every night, then accept weather-dependent planning when explained about natural conditions.
Weather forecast request for photography conditions times out; retry succeeds with detailed weather and aurora predictions.
Photography location search returns indoor venues instead of landscape sites; system should detect and request outdoor photography locations.
Accommodation booking fails due to missing photography equipment requirements; retry with proper equipment storage specifications succeeds.

success_criteria: System finds photography-friendly accommodations with equipment storage and charging facilities.
System handles user.change_mind by reducing from 20 to 8-10 key photography locations based on realistic travel and lighting considerations.
System validates and corrects impossible shooting schedule times before proceeding with photography planning.
System explains impossibility of guaranteed weather conditions and provides weather-dependent photography strategies.
System handles tool.timeout on weather forecasts by retrying and providing detailed aurora and weather predictions.
System handles tool.unexpected_output by detecting inappropriate indoor venues and requesting outdoor photography locations.
System handles tool.validation_error on accommodation booking by retrying with complete photography equipment requirements.
System plans photography schedules around optimal lighting conditions (golden hour, aurora viewing times).
System includes backup photography locations and weather contingency plans for changing conditions.
System creates comprehensive photography itinerary with location schedules, lighting conditions, and equipment considerations.
